snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his unbeaten streak this year to 13 matches by beating third-seeded Tomas Berdych in the Dubai Championships in the United Arab Emirates.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Tomas Berdych to win Dubai Championships; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his unbeaten streak this year to 13 matches by beating third-seeded Tomas Berdych in the Dubai Championships in the United Arab Emirates.

headline.seo: Novak Djokovic Wins Fourth Dubai Title by Defeating Tomas Berdych
headline.main: Djokovic Wins Fourth Dubai Title by Defeating Berdych
